Every post will have a picture (with alt text)
I try to keep a positive, gentle vibe 😌

I enjoy painting! My mind feels a little bit... different? Painting helps me cope. I'm neuro divergent, have a Chiari malformation, and like many of us, mental health issues. My brain's a triple threat, baby. Been doing good though and appreciating life 😌

I wish people were less self hating. I'm pretty human positive ❤️
♾️
